author: Neil Strawson and Richard Hunt
programme: I Can Cook on the Go
method: Mash the watermelon in a bowl, then stir in the lemon juice. Sieve the watermelon into a jug and press down gently on the pulp to extract all the juice. Pour the juice into glasses filled with ice and garnish with the mint.
